text: (ai rasool) tum se log anaphaal (maale ganeemat) ke baare mein poochha karate hain tum kah do ki anaphaal makhasoos khuda aur rasool ke vaaste hai to khuda se daro (aur) apane baahamee (aapasee) maamalaat kee isalaah karo aur agar tum sachche (eemaanadaar) ho to khuda kee aur usake rasool kee itaat karo
